and t1.PARENT_ID =#{bean.parentId}
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')

and t1.MANUFACTURER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.manufacturerId}),'%')
and t1.SUPPLIER like concat(concat('%',#{bean.supplier}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_DATE >= #{bean.createdDateBegin}
and t1.CREATED_DATE <= #{bean.createdDateEnd}
and t1.POSITION_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.positionId}),'%')
and t1.ORIGINAL_VALUE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.originalValue}),'%')
and t1.NET_VALUE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.netValue}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceState}),'%')
and t1.INVENTORY_PERSON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.inventoryPerson}),'%')
and t1.INVENTORY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.inventoryDept}),'%')
and t1.INVENTORY_DATE >= #{bean.inventoryDateBegin}
and t1.INVENTORY_DATE <= #{bean.inventoryDateEnd}
and t1.REMARKS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.remarks}),'%')
and t1.FLAG like concat(concat('%',#{bean.flag}),'%')
and t1.INVENTORY_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.inventoryState}),'%')
and t1.INVENTORY_RESULT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.inventoryResult}),'%')

and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
order by ${pOrderBy}
